name: Bmber
description:
Hi there!

Try to clear the field to land and beat the global online high score to be the best in this classic. New features and improvements are coming soon! Meanwhile, enjoy the first release.

The game is hooked to global ranking. Your high score will be transferred to the server so you can compare yourself to other players. You can browse it in the game by clicking the high score button in the main menu and on the page.

If you want to help with the game, message me directly.

Try it out, and let me know if you like it!

Have fun!
